'''Alpha v1.0.7'''<ref>{{ytl|1Cov2u7kWbw|Minecraft hell|Subintro|July 19, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 19, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:832681960|Incidental bugfix!]] – The Word of Notch, July 19, 2010</ref> to fix a bug.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a bug that caused the [[player]] to get stuck under certain circumstances.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This is one of the only five Minecraft versions to end with 1.x.7, the other ones being [[Java Edition 1.4.7|1.4.7]] (2013), [[Java Edition 1.7.7|1.7.7]] (2014), [[Java Edition 1.8.7|1.8.7]] (2015), and [[Java Edition 1.21.7|1.21.7]] (2025).
